Race.SpecificTitle: Member of School Board -- District 3, Division 2
PW Police Jury (Vet.) -- Disabled Vet. Homestead Exemp. -PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of East Feliciana, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of East Feliciana, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in East Feliciana Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of East Feliciana Parish voting on this proposition?
